DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the corneal changes after performing 20 gauge vitrectomy associated with scleral buckling for the treatment of rhegmatogenous retinal detachment.
DOC.detailed_description: Patients submitted to 20-gauge vitrectomy associated with scleral buckling were evaluated with corneal topography before surgery and in the 7,30 and 90 days after surgery to asses corneal curvature changes.
DOC.criteria: Patients with rhegmatogenous retinal detachments Previous eye surgery
